summary: Award-winning investigation into the crimes of Robert Pickton. This documentary explores why it took so many years to capture and convict Canada's most prolific serial killer. Troubling revelations about who knew what, and when.
cast: Maggie Huculak|Vicki Gabereau|Tamara Hamilton|Renee Olbert|Robert Pickton|Chuck Walkinshaw|John Walsh
title: The Pig Farm
